article.title: VRC to Support Center for Homeland Defense and Security
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Center for Homeland Defense and Security

article.text: VRC Incorporated, San Antonio, Texas, is being awarded a potential $20, 910, 845 firm-fixed-price, definite-quantity contract for information technology support services in support of the Center for Homeland Defense and Security, Naval Postgraduate School. The Naval Supply Systems Command (NAVSUP) Weapon Systems Support, Mechanicsburg, Pennsylvania, is the contracting activity.
